alias_notes.num_parking_spaces: Ambiguous scope. Treat as TOTAL spaces at canonical entity scope unless explicitly per-unit/per-acre.
alias_notes.parking_count: Ambiguous scope. Treat as TOTAL spaces at canonical entity scope unless explicitly per-unit/per-acre.
alias_notes.parking_spaces: Ambiguous scope. Treat as TOTAL spaces at canonical entity scope unless explicitly per-unit/per-acre.
alias_notes.project__parking_spaces_total: Legacy project rollup / boundary leak. Canonicalized to property__parking_spaces_total for MF property scope.
alias_notes.project__total_units: Legacy project rollup / boundary leak. Canonicalized to property__total_units for MF property scope.
alias_notes.unit_count: Context-dependent: used for per-unit-type row counts (not property rollup).
alias_notes.unit_type__total_units: Context-dependent: unit-type level total; treat as row-level count.

canonical_notes.property__parking_spaces_total: MF source of truth lives on tbl_multifamily_property; project-level total is a legacy rollup.
canonical_notes.property__total_units: MF source of truth lives on tbl_multifamily_property; project-level total is a legacy rollup.
